review: This is a fantastic device.  The price is great and the functionality is awesome.  Lots of features, lots of apps and even some decent games although it wont replace a game console.  Well worth the money. Best of all, it is simple and easy to use an it just plain works.
author: Eric in CT

review: Very easy to set up and use. Works as advertised.
author: B. Moore

review: I love the Amazon firestick it is amazing.  We have been able to open up a whole new world of tv shows and movies.
author: Jessica Howard

review: This blows away my android stick and my raspberry pi as a media player..My fire TV is Wayyyy better and faster, side loading for both is a plus.The Fire tv is in the living room and the fire stick is in the bedroom...Do yourself a favor,spend the money for the fire TV,you can hard wire it to the internet,it is quad core (makes a difference),has a better remote,and is faster.I Love my fire stick,it has it's place and was cheap.but there is a difference.It's good for the kids or the tight budget,but if you had both you would definitely notice the difference
author: Lewis

review: Absolutely awesome and so easy to set up and work.  There's even an app to work it from your phone!
author: Douglas Kelly

review: I love my Fire stick. I can access my favorite apps anywhere I want. No need to bring DVD player. I can use it on any room in the house. Instead of my daughter taking the wii upstairs to watch Netflix or AMAZON instant video, she can just take a little fire stick and power cord,so easy and so convenient. Great buy!!!
author: Bargainstore123 "Owner InfernoX"

review: I am loving the Fire TV Stick, my only wish is that I could stream a webpage if I wanted to
